dataList.title: Dreaming Electric Sheep
dataList.eventDesc:
At the end of each cable strewn about the floor is a plug.

Perhaps the sheep knows what it implies.

It lets out a sorrowful cry.

As the Sinners converge on the sheep, the greater, more desperate its screams grow.

The sheep begins to thrash wildly.

Its resistance will only intensify.
dataList.behaveDesc: Who will try to hold the sheep down?
successDesc:
[{0}] raises a cable and connects it to the sheep.

Violent sprays of sparks fill your vision for a brief moment.

The sheep cries terribly for a while before falling silent, its eyes shut.

[{0}] regards the silent sheep. Silent as though in a dream.

[{0}] rejoins the battle, their body seared with lightning.
failureDesc:
Just as [{0}] is about to connect the cable to the sheep,

It kicks [{0}] hard with its long legs.

After tumbling a few feet on the ground, the Sinner blankly stares at the halfway-inserted cable for a moment...

Before a strike of violet, screaming lightning directly smites them.

dataList.title: Portrait of a Certain Day
dataList.eventDesc:
'I am a butler of this manor.'

'Yet I do not recognize your faces.'

'I cannot help but be wary; perhaps you seek to mire this manor again in sorrow.'

'If you claim otherwise, then allow me to inquire. Which of these portraits is that of my master?'
successDesc:
[{0}] confidently steps forward and points a finger at one of the portraits.

The monster stands still for a moment, then replies affirmatively.

'You are familiar with my master.'

'Though you are an interloper still, I see no a bringer of sorrow.'

The monster, still holding a portrait, appears somewhat less hostile.
failureDesc:
[{0}] confidently steps forward, and points their finger at one of the portraits.

The monster stands still for a moment, then cries out all of a sudden.

'You do not even recognize my master's countenance...'

'Indeed. You are but an interloper seeking to bring sorrow to this place once again.'

'How dare you pretend to know which that you do not. This transgression shan't be so easily forgiven.'

{0} suddenly feels the burning gaze of every single portrait in the room focus on them.

Each and every single one of them holds... resentment.

dataList.title: The King in Binds
dataList.eventDesc:
Donning the mask once again summons the ardent emotions that slowly simmer into your heart.

The sorrow rises through the fog of heated battle; its dense weight pierces deep, deep into your emotions.
successDesc:
The sorrowful pressure slowly relents.

The banquet is far from over.

The Sinners each rise and shake off the gloom; the void in their hearts filled with determination.
failureDesc:
The deluge of sorrow sweeps the Sinners off their feet into an even deeper chasm.

Yet, the banquet continues still.

The Sinners repress their sorrows and step forward.
